item.title: linux tuning
item.description: 地址 http://www.enigma.id.au/linux_tuning.txt # server with a decent amount of memory. # # This file should be saved as /etc/sysctl.conf # You can source it manually if your system has booted by using: # sysctl -e -p /etc/sysctl.conf # # Paul Day, paul (at) bur.st # # Last updated 02/03/05
